actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 to increase the U.S. share of allowable project costs under such act; to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to prohibit certain State taxation of persons in air commerce; and for other purposes.

summary.text: Airport and Airway Improvemement Act - Increases, under the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970, the United States share of allowable project costs under such Act. Prohibits, under the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, State taxation of persons in air commerce. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 1711, 1712(a) and 1714(b))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 to increase the U.S. share of allowable project costs under such act; to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to prohibit certain State taxation of persons in air commerce; and for other purposes.
